mapper.select: select distinct(pc.orderid) , pc.custid , pc.addr , pc.pay , pc.totalprice , pc.receiver , pc.receiver_phone , pc.totalcnt , pc.order_date , d.delstate , c.phone as cust_phone, prod.name as item_name from purchase pc inner join delivery d on d.orderid=pc.orderid inner join cust c on c.custid=pc.custid inner join ( select i.name , od.orderid from order_detail od inner join item i on i.itemid=od.itemid ) prod on prod.orderid=pc.orderid where pc.custid=#{custid}
